page.topic: How do I create an API Key?
page.description: In order to use the TransForm API, you must create an API key with the appropriate access permissions.

description.p: Calls to the TransForm API require an API key with the appropriate permissions, i.e. "scopes", to access the endpoint.
To create an API key, log in to *[link:TransForm Central@https://transform.alphasoftware.com]*.
Click the *[ui:Home]* tab, then under *[ui:Developer Options]* click *[ui:Get API Key]*.
Select the desired scope(s). Hold the ctrl key to select multiple scopes. Then, generate the key. Make sure to store your API Key in a secure location.

tip.p: The required scopes for an endpoint are listed in the [TransForm API Reference]. Your API key only needs to include one of the listed scopes.
